review.pros: Pros – As agencies across the federal government look for ways to increase collaboration between employees, manage documents, and cut costs, NOAA’s move to the cloud can be seen as a success story.
review.cons: Cons – I'm often asked why I've chosen to work for the government. Sometimes it's asked at conferences by other govt officials who are looking for guidance on how to recruit and retain Generation.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – In most project management methodologies risk tends to be viewed in a very negative sense. It is generally defined in terms of something that might occur to adversely affect you achieving your goals.
